name: Animal Welfare And Trade Ltd
goal:
Provision of consultancy and other related services, mainly in - but not limited to – the field of animal welfare.
Other commercial services provided, if compatible with the company’s ethics.
interests: Agriculture, Borders and Security, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Review of EC Regulation 543/2008
- EU Platform on Animal Welfare
- Use of force-feeding in foie gras production
- Identification and registration of companion animals
- Trade agreements
- Farm animal welfare
